events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I need to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all and I would like to return it.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request related to the jacket size problem communicated by the customer.
An available customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case and will contact the customer shortly.
